20110108020337.000|20110108020342.000|CC1|WAYS.                           
20110108020342.000|20110108020343.000|CC1|FOR AMERICAN WORKERS, THE JOBS  
20110108020343.000|20110108020344.000|CC1|REPORT WAS DECIDEDLY A GOOD     
20110108020344.000|20110108020350.000|CC1|NEWS/BAD NEWS STORY.            
20110108020350.000|20110108020352.000|CC1|ON UNEMPLOYMENT, THE GOOD NEWS  
20110108020352.000|20110108020352.000|CC1|WAS THE RATE DROPPED FROM 9.8%  
20110108020352.000|20110108020354.000|CC1|TO 9.4%.                        
20110108020354.000|20110108020355.000|CC1|THAT WAS THE LOWEST IT'S BEEN IN
20110108020355.000|20110108020357.000|CC1|19 MONTHS.                      
20110108020357.000|20110108020359.000|CC1|THE BAD NEWS-- THE DROP WAS     
20110108020359.000|20110108020401.000|CC1|MAINLY BECAUSE SO MANY PEOPLE   
20110108020401.000|20110108020403.000|CC1|STOPPED SEARCHING FOR WORK, SO  
20110108020403.000|20110108020404.000|CC1|THEY WERE NO LONGER COUNTED AS  
20110108020404.000|20110108020407.000|CC1|UNEMPLOYED.                     
20110108020407.000|20110108020410.000|CC1|LIKEWISE ON JOB CREATION--      
20110108020410.000|20110108020413.000|CC1|EMPLOYERS ADDED 103,000 NEW     
20110108020413.000|20110108020416.000|CC1|POSITIONS IN DECEMBER, NEARLY   
20110108020416.000|20110108020417.000|CC1|ALL OF THEM IN THE PRIVATE      
20110108020417.000|20110108020419.000|CC1|SECTOR.                         
20110108020419.000|20110108020419.000|CC1|BUT IT TAKES 125,000 JUST TO    
20110108020419.000|20110108020422.000|CC1|MEET POPULATION GROWTH.         
20110108020422.000|20110108020424.000|CC1|THE NUMBER WOULD HAVE TO BE     
20110108020424.000|20110108020425.000|CC1|TWICE THAT LARGE TO MAKE A REAL 
20110108020425.000|20110108020427.000|CC1|DENT IN UNEMPLOYMENT.           
20110108020427.000|20110108020429.000|CC1|THE CHAIRMAN OF THE FEDERAL     
20110108020429.000|20110108020432.000|CC1|RESERVE, BEN BERNANKE,          
20110108020432.000|20110108020433.000|CC1|UNDERSCORED THE POINT AT A      
20110108020433.000|20110108020434.000|CC1|SENATE HEARING THIS MORNING.    
20110108020434.000|20110108020436.000|CC1|>> THE ECONOMIC RECOVERY THAT   
20110108020436.000|20110108020437.000|CC1|BEGAN A YEAR AND A HALF AGO IS  
20110108020437.000|20110108020439.000|CC1|CONTINUING, ALTHOUGH, TO DATE,  
20110108020439.000|20110108020440.000|CC1|AT A PACE THAT HAS BEEN         
20110108020440.000|20110108020441.000|CC1|INSUFFICIENT TO REDUCE THE RATE 
20110108020441.000|20110108020444.000|CC1|OF UNEMPLOYMENT SIGNIFICANTLY.  
20110108020444.000|20110108020445.000|CC1|AT THIS RATE OF IMPROVEMENT, IT 
20110108020445.000|20110108020446.000|CC1|COULD TAKE FOUR TO FIVE MORE

20110108020447.000|20110108020449.000|CC1|NORMALIZE FULLY.                
20110108020449.000|20110108020450.000|CC1|>> Woodruff: TODAY'S REPORT DID 
20110108020450.000|20110108020453.000|CC1|SHOW THE ECONOMY GENERATED      
20110108020453.000|20110108020454.000|CC1|70,000 MORE JOBS THAN FIRST

20110108020457.000|20110108020459.000|CC1|BUT BERNANKE SAID THE LARGE POOL

20110108020501.000|20110108020503.000|CC1|REMAINS CAUSE FOR CONCERN.      
20110108020503.000|20110108020506.000|CC1|>> ROUGHLY 40% OF THE UNEMPLOYED
20110108020506.000|20110108020508.000|CC1|HAVE BEEN OUT OF WORK FOR SIX   
20110108020508.000|20110108020510.000|CC1|MONTHS OR MORE.

20110108020511.000|20110108020513.000|CC1|IMPOSES EXCEPTIONAL HARDSHIPS ON

20110108020517.000|20110108020518.000|CC1|THOSE WORKERS AND MAY INFLICT

20110108020538.000|20110108020539.000|CC1|WE SAW 12 STRAIGHT MONTHS OF    
20110108020539.000|20110108020541.000|CC1|PRIVATE SECTOR JOB GROWTH.      
20110108020541.000|20110108020543.000|CC1|THAT'S THE FIRST TIME THAT'S    
20110108020543.000|20110108020548.000|CC1|BEEN TRUE SINCE 2006.

20110108020556.000|20110108020557.000|CC1|MEANS THAT THE PACE OF HIRING IS

20110108020632.000|20110108020634.000|CC1|NEW REPUBLICAN SPEAKER OF THE   
20110108020634.000|20110108020635.000|CC1|HOUSE, ISSUED A STATEMENT SAYING
20110108020635.000|20110108020638.000|CC1|AMERICANS AREN'T LOOKING FOR NEW
20110108020638.000|20110108020639.000|CC1|FACES, BUT NEW POLICIES TO CUT  
20110108020639.000|20110108020642.000|CC1|SPENDING AND GROW THE ECONOMY.  
20110108020642.000|20110108020644.000|CC1|FOR A DEEPER LOOK INTO JUST WHAT
20110108020644.000|20110108020646.000|CC1|TODAY'S JOBS NUMBERS REVEAL, WE 
20110108020646.000|20110108020648.000|CC1|TURN TO CATHERINE MANN,         
20110108020648.000|20110108020649.000|CC1|PROFESSOR OF ECONOMICS AND      
20110108020649.000|20110108020652.000|CC1|FINANCE AT BRANDEIS UNIVERSITY; 
20110108020652.000|20110108020654.000|CC1|AND JOHN CHALLENGER, CHIEF      
20110108020654.000|20110108020656.000|CC1|EXECUTIVE OFFICER OF THE        
20110108020656.000|20110108020657.000|CC1|OUTPLACEMENT FIRM CHALLENGER,   
20110108020657.000|20110108020659.000|CC1|GRAY, AND CHRISTMAS, WHICH      
20110108020659.000|20110108020700.000|CC1|RECENTLY SURVEYED PEOPLE OUT OF 
20110108020700.000|20110108020704.000|CC1|WORK FOR EXTENDED PERIODS.      
20110108020704.000|20110108020705.000|CC1|THANK YOU BATT FOR TALKING      
20110108020705.000|20110108020707.000|CC1|WITH US, TO YOU FIRST, AS       
20110108020707.000|20110108020709.000|CC1|YOU LOOK AT THESE NUMBERS,      
20110108020709.000|20110108020710.000|CC1|WHAT STRIKES YOU,S WHAT A       
20110108020710.000|20110108020711.000|CC1|MOST IMPORTANT HERE?            
20110108020711.000|20110108020713.000|CC1|>> WELL, YOU KNOW, I WAS        
20110108020713.000|20110108020715.000|CC1|READY TO CHEER WHEN I SAW       
20110108020715.000|20110108020718.000|CC1|THE UNEMPLOYMENT RATE, WHEN     
20110108020718.000|20110108020719.000|CC1|I FIRST LOOKED AT THE           
20110108020719.000|20110108020719.000|CC1|NUMBERS THIS MORNING GOING      
20110108020719.000|20110108020721.000|CC1|DOWN TO 9.4%.                   
20110108020721.000|20110108020723.000|CC1|AND IT WAS ONLY WHEN WE         
20110108020723.000|20110108020724.000|CC1|STARTED LOOKING AT THE          
20110108020724.000|20110108020726.000|CC1|UNDERPINNINGS THAT IT SORT      
20110108020726.000|20110108020728.000|CC1|OF BECAME FAR MORE NUANCED.     
20110108020728.000|20110108020730.000|CC1|IT IS A PROBLEM THAT THE        
20110108020730.000|20110108020732.000|CC1|BULK OF THE IMPROVEMENT HAS     
20110108020732.000|20110108020733.000|CC1|COME FROM PEOPLE WHO HAVE       
20110108020733.000|20110108020735.000|CC1|LEFT THE LABOR FORCE.           
20110108020735.000|20110108020736.000|CC1|PRIMARILY MEN WHO HAVE LEFT     
20110108020736.000|20110108020738.000|CC1|THE LABOR FORCE AND ARE NO      
20110108020738.000|20110108020740.000|CC1|LONGER LOOKING FOR WORK.        
20110108020740.000|20110108020741.000|CC1|AND SO THAT'S WHY THE           
20110108020741.000|20110108020742.000|CC1|UNEMPLOYMENT RATE FELL SO       
20110108020742.000|20110108020743.000|CC1|MUCH.                           
20110108020743.000|20110108020745.000|CC1|NOW THERE ARE SOME BRIGHT       
20110108020745.000|20110108020746.000|CC1|SPOTS.                          
20110108020746.000|20110108020748.000|CC1|THE NATURE OF THE JOB           
20110108020748.000|20110108020750.000|CC1|CREATION, LEISURE AND           
20110108020750.000|20110108020751.000|CC1|HOSPITALITY, ONE CAN ARGUE      
20110108020751.000|20110108020753.000|CC1|THAT PEOPLE ARE FEELINGING A    
20110108020753.000|20110108020754.000|CC1|LITTLE BIT BETTER ABOUT         
20110108020754.000|20110108020755.000|CC1|THEIR POCKETBOOK THAT           
20110108020755.000|20110108020756.000|CC1|THEY'RE WILLING TO GO OUT       
20110108020756.000|20110108020757.000|CC1|FOR DINNER, THEY'RE WILLING     
20110108020757.000|20110108020800.000|CC1|TO GO FOR A WEEKEND AWAY.

20110108022233.000|20110108022234.000|CC1|THE NORTH, WHO ASSUMED THE UNITY
20110108022234.000|20110108022234.000|CC1|SYMBOL.                         
20110108022234.000|20110108022236.000|CC1|"WE WON'T HAVE A PROBLEM IF THE 
20110108022236.000|20110108022238.000|CC1|VOTE GOES FOR SEPARATION," THEY 
20110108022238.000|20110108022239.000|CC1|SAID, "BUT WE WANT UNITY, TO    
20110108022239.000|20110108022242.000|CC1|STAY AS ONE NATION."            
20110108022242.000|20110108022243.000|CC1|NOW, A SHOW OF HANDS FOR        
20110108022243.000|20110108022246.000|CC1|SEPARATION?                     
20110108022246.000|20110108022251.000|CC1|>> ( translated ): WE WILL HAVE 
20110108022251.000|20110108022253.000|CC1|MANY CHANGES.                   
20110108022253.000|20110108022254.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IT'S A TALL ORDER. 
20110108022254.000|20110108022255.000|CC1|SOUTH SUDAN WOULD BE ONE OF THE 
20110108022255.000|20110108022258.000|CC1|POOREST NATIONS ON EARTH.       
20110108022258.000|20110108022300.000|CC1|PAVED ROADS AND HEALTH CLINICS  
20110108022300.000|20110108022302.000|CC1|ARE ALMOST NONEXISTENT, AND     
20110108022302.000|20110108022305.000|CC1|ILLITERACY IS ABOUT 85%.        
20110108022305.000|20110108022306.000|CC1|ADD TO THAT A CONTINUED FEAR OF 
20110108022306.000|20110108022308.000|CC1|RENEWED VIOLENCE.               
20110108022308.000|20110108022310.000|CC1|THE CRUCIAL AGREEMENT ON OIL    
20110108022310.000|20110108022310.000|CC1|REVENUE SHARING STILL           
20110108022310.000|20110108022312.000|CC1|LANGUISHES.

20110108022432.000|20110108022434.000|CC1|NORTHEAST OHIO RAVAGED BY

20110108022931.000|20110108022932.000|CC1|MOST IMPORTANT THINGS ARE JOBS. 
20110108022932.000|20110108022933.000|CC1|WE GOT TO GET THOSE BACK.       
20110108022933.000|20110108022935.000|CC1|>> Suarez: IN PREVIOUS          
20110108022935.000|20110108022936.000|CC1|GENERATIONS, MEN AND WOMEN WENT 
20110108022936.000|20110108022938.000|CC1|BACK AND SAID, "LOOK AT WHAT    
20110108022938.000|20110108022939.000|CC1|I'VE BROUGHT TO THE DISTRICT.   
20110108022939.000|20110108022941.000|CC1|THE GOVERNMENT'S SPENDING MONEY,

20110108022942.000|20110108022943.000|CC1|YOU."                           
20110108022943.000|20110108022945.000|CC1|IS THAT GOING TO BE CHANGED NOW 
20110108022945.000|20110108022947.000|CC1|THAT A CONGRESS HAS COME TO

20110108022950.000|20110108022953.000|CC1|PURPOSE OF SAYING "WE DON'T WANT

20110108025057.000|20110108025059.000|CC1|>> AND SO WE START WITH THE

20110108025109.000|20110108025112.000|CC1|EXTRACTION WITH METHYLNEN

20110108025113.000|20110108025116.000|CC1|>> THE OYSTER SAMPLES ARE       
20110108025116.000|20110108025119.000|CC1|TESTED FOR PAHs THAT OCCUR      
20110108025119.000|20110108025120.000|CC1|IN OIL.                         
20110108025120.000|20110108025122.000|CC1|PAHs ARE OF CONCERN BECAUSE     
20110108025122.000|20110108025123.000|CC1|SOME COMPOUNDS HAVE BEEN        
20110108025123.000|20110108025125.000|CC1|FOUND TO CAUSE CANCER.          
20110108025125.000|20110108025127.000|CC1|BIRTH DEFECTS AND CELLULAR      
20110108025127.000|20110108025129.000|CC1|MEW SAYS-- MUTATION.            
20110108025129.000|20110108025131.000|CC1|THIS PAH TESTING IS MIRRORED    
20110108025131.000|20110108025133.000|CC1|BY BOTH FEDERAL AND STATE       
20110108025133.000|20110108025134.000|CC1|CONTRACTED INDEPENDENT          
20110108025134.000|20110108025134.000|CC1|LABORATORIES.                   
20110108025134.000|20110108025136.000|CC1|AND THE GOVERNMENT HAS          
20110108025136.000|20110108025138.000|CC1|ESTABLISHED LEVELS THAT POSE    
20110108025138.000|20110108025139.000|CC1|A THREAT TO HUMANS.             
20110108025139.000|20110108025141.000|CC1|>> THIS IS THE INITIAL          
20110108025141.000|20110108025146.000|CC1|EXTRACT WITH WITH THE           
20110108025146.000|20110108025147.000|CC1|METHYLENE CHLORIDE IN THE

20110108025149.000|20110108025150.000|CC1|ARE IN THIS SOLUTION.           
20110108025150.000|20110108025151.000|CC1|>> Reporter: TESTS ON THIS      
20110108025151.000|20110108025152.000|CC1|OYSTER SOLUTION WOULD SHOW      
20110108025152.000|20110108025155.000|CC1|UP TO 12 DIFFERENT              
20110108025155.000|20110108025157.000|CC1|COMPONENTS OF PAH               
20110108025157.000|20110108025157.000|CC1|CONTAMINANTS.                   
20110108025157.000|20110108025159.000|CC1|SO FAR TESTS HAVE FOUND ALL     
20110108025159.000|20110108025200.000|CC1|THE LEVELS TO BE WITHIN WHAT
